attributes.action: Hold a referendum to leave the European Union, in its entirity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the view of many people in this country that being part "Europe" is damaging our economy, solcial structure and values. We the undersigned should like the Prime Minister to present a referendum to the people of the United Kindom with one question and one question only, "Would you like to withdraw from The European Union in its entirity?" By this we mean financially, morally, legally and by any attachment to the European Union.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
